title: kani madhura gItam
sahitya:
kani madhura gItam pozhivAnE anbuk-kaNnan en karaNamAm paNNUru kuzhalilE


anupallavi

  iniyavan amudinaip-parugi parugi en paramAnandam peruga perugavE


caraNam    nAda sukhattilE nAn sokka sokka jIva nAthaniDam ennuyir sikka sikkavE
bAdhakak-kavalaigaL uTka uTkavE parishuddha dhyAnattil harikrSNa gOvindan
